Cloudy with occasional showers overnight PERIOD Low 42F PERIOD Winds SSE at  to  mph PERIOD Chance of rain  PERIOD

Updated November     pm



On his first day in office President Joe Biden signed  executive orders PERIOD The orders targeted several key areas he focused on during his campaign including climate change immigration and the pandemic PERIOD

One of Bidens executive orders appointed Jeffrey D PERIOD Zients former head of the Obama administrations National Economic Council as the official COVID19 response coordinator PERIOD The order also restored the directorate for global health security and biodefense at the National Security Council which was dissolved under the Trump administration in  PERIOD

Another order makes social distancing and masks required on all federal property for all federal employees PERIOD The order is not a national mask mandate but Biden is starting a  days masking challenge to encourage Americans to wear masks PERIOD The challenge also hopes to inspire state and local officials to implement public measures to prevent the spread of the coronavirus PERIOD Biden also reinstated ties with the World Health Organization WHO with Dr PERIOD Anthony Fauci acting as head of the U.S PERIOD delegation on the WHOs executive board PERIOD Formerpresident Trump chose to withdraw the nations membership and funding last year PERIOD

The Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals DACA program was also revamped by executive order PERIOD The program seeks to protect the children of illegal immigrants from threats of deportation PERIOD The same order also requests that Congress enact legislation to provide permanent legal status and a path to citizenship for those same immigrants PERIOD

Trumps plan to exclude noncitizens from the census count was revoked by executive order as well PERIOD A previous executive order by Trump that pushed for aggressive deportation efforts was also overturned by Biden PERIOD The deportation of Liberians living in the U.S PERIOD has been blocked and the Muslim ban was ended too PERIOD The latter order had blocked travel into the U.S PERIOD from several Middle Eastern and African countries with heavy Muslim populations PERIOD Construction of the border wall has been halted and the same order also calls for the immediate termination of the national emergency declaration that gave Trump access to billions of dollars for the construction of the wall PERIOD

Several of Trumps environmental policies have been reversed by the Biden administration as well PERIOD The United States will rejoin the Paris Climate Agreement on Friday Feb PERIOD  PERIOD The U.S PERIOD removed itself from the treaty in  PERIOD The permit for the Keystone XL pipeline has been revoked and rollbacks to vehicle emissions standards have been reversed PERIOD Decisions to slash the size of several national monument areas have been undone as well PERIOD A temporary moratorium has been placed on oil and natural gas leases in Alaskas Arctic National Wildlife Refuge PERIOD Other Biden policies address government accountability the economy and racial and LGBTQ equality PERIOD In the coming months Biden will continue attempts to set his agenda in place PERIOD

Never miss our photos stories and videos PERIOD
title: Biden enacts executive orders | News | msuexponent.com
name: Montana State University Bozeman
